title: A GBP account merged with a non-custodial
tooltip: Non-custodial crypto wallets give you complete control and ownership of your funds. Nobody can freeze your assets/withdrawals, block them or take them away.
hero-description: Spend, transfer and exchange your pounds or your crypto indifferently
best-account-text: Get your own account number, instant transfers, physical/virtual cards, and multiple currencies at the best exchange rates.
brand-your-card: Brand your card with your own NFT
deposit-your-crypto-text: Unlimited crypto deposit and withdrawals. Unlimited exchange to FIAT.
cash-or-crypto:
In <1>Cash or in Crypto
It's up to you!
cash-or-crypto-text-1: We'll handle the exchange of Crypto and GBP
cash-or-crypto-text-2: under the hood based on your needs
wallet protected-2: Your wealth is safe and nobody can freeze it or take it away.
live-support-text: Talk to a real human (not a machine).
